content: this crochet container set includes three table-top baskets in different sizes these are perfect for organizing jewelry pens and pencils crochet hooks and more this pattern was originally published in three clues as the nineteenth weekend mystery crochet along with underground crafter 1 > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 2 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain single_crochet slip_stitch crocheting in the round increasing joining with mattress stitch seam joining with single_crochet seam includes video tutorials **skill level** easy **finished sizes** containers 13 5 34 5 cm circumference in 2 5 cm 3 7 5 cm and 6 15 cm height **materials** king cole camouflage 3 dk yarn 100% acrylic 3 5 oz/100 g 311 yd/285 m 2 skeins in 5361 woodland *or approximately 470 yd 430 m in any light weight acrylic yarn* **this pattern is worked with 2 strands held together throughout alternatively you can use a single strand of medium weight yarn but the amount of yarn needed will vary ** us size i-9/5 5 mm crochet hook *or any size needed to obtain correct gauge * yarn needle stitch markers **gauge** with 2 strands of yarn held together 14 single_crochet = 4 10 cm across *exact gauge is not critical for this pattern stitches should be tight to form a stiff fabric * 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2022/01/28/weekend-mystery-crochet-alongs/ 2 https //undergroundcrafter com/2025/05/23/weekend-mystery-cal-19/ 3 https //www lovecrafts com/en-us/p/king-cole-camouflage utm_medium=affiliate&a_aid=35c8ae00
